comment: Very nice and smart. Very difficult to get an A in her class...she tells you this on the first day. I learned a lot in her class. Just read the book and do the work and you'll be fine.

She's a nice lady, pretty young,class was cancelled alot, she wasnt great at explaining, wasnt clear on what she expected in the research paper, alot alot of material to cover, you have to read the whole book to understand, took notes everyday in class...um got off topic alot...sooo u should look for another teacher first.

She knows her stuff, but getting her students to know her stuff is the hard part. Its a lot of learning for yourself and reading. Not everything on the test was covered in class. Very nice woman and she's very smart.
